organizations.name: Medical Coding Online
organizations.disclaimerText: All exams are independent practice tools designed to build proficiency and are not affiliated with any official certifying body unless explicitly stated.

exams.name: CPC Practice Exam
exams.description: A comprehensive practice test for the Certified Professional Coder (CPC) exam.

exams.name: CPC Certification Exam
exams.description: The official certification exam to become a Certified Professional Coder (CPC).

exams.name: CIC Practice Exam
exams.description: A practice test for the Certified Inpatient Coder (CIC) exam.

exams.name: CIC Certification Exam
exams.description: The official certification exam to become a Certified Inpatient Coder (CIC).

exams.name: COC Practice Exam
exams.description: A practice test for the Certified Outpatient Coder (COC) exam.

exams.name: COC Certification Exam
exams.description: The official certification exam to become a Certified Outpatient Coder (COC).

examProductCategories.name: Certified Professional Coder (CPC)
examProductCategories.description: Prepare for the industry-standard CPC certification with our comprehensive practice and full-length exams.

examProductCategories.name: Certified Inpatient Coder (CIC)
examProductCategories.description: Master inpatient coding skills required for the CIC certification.

examProductCategories.name: Certified Outpatient Coder (COC)
examProductCategories.description: Sharpen your outpatient coding expertise for the COC certification.

certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: This certifies that {candidateName} has successfully demonstrated proficiency in the {examName} practice exam, achieving a score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Professional Coder
certificateTemplates.body: This is to certify that {candidateName} has successfully completed the rigorous requirements of the {examName} and is hereby awarded this certificate upon achieving a passing score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Inpatient Coder
certificateTemplates.body: This is to certify that {candidateName} has successfully completed the rigorous requirements of the {examName} and is hereby awarded this certificate upon achieving a passing score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.title: Certified Outpatient Coder
certificateTemplates.body: This is to certify that {candidateName} has successfully completed the rigorous requirements of the {examName} and is hereby awarded this certificate upon achieving a passing score of {finalScore}%.

suggestedBooks.title: CPC® Study Guide 2024 - Official AAPC Certification
suggestedBooks.description: The official study guide from AAPC for the Certified Professional Coder (CPC) exam. Essential for preparation.

suggestedBooks.title: CIC® Study Guide 2024 - Official AAPC Certification
suggestedBooks.description: The official study guide from AAPC for the Certified Inpatient Coder (CIC) exam. Essential for preparation.

suggestedBooks.title: COC® Study Guide 2024 - Official AAPC Certification
suggestedBooks.description: The official study guide from AAPC for the Certified Outpatient Coder (COC) exam. Essential for preparation.
